products.name: Besan (Gram Flour) Premium
products.description: Finely ground gram flour (besan) made from high-quality chickpeas, perfect for cooking and baking.

more_details.Key Features: High protein content, pure and fresh besan suited for traditional dishes and snacks.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in airtight container away from moisture and heat.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement allowed only for sealed and defective packs within 72 hours.

products.name: Sooji (Semolina) Fine
products.description: Premium quality fine sooji (semolina), ideal for making upma, halwa, and other dishes.

more_details.Key Features: Fine texture, consistent quality, free from impurities.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in airtight container, away from dampness.
more_details.Return Policy: Non-returnable except for damaged goods; claim within 72 hours.

products.name: Maida (Refined Wheat Flour)
products.description: Pure refined wheat flour (maida) for bakery, snacks, and traditional recipes.

more_details.Key Features: Fine texture, free of impurities, suitable for versatile culinary uses.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in cool, dry place in tightly closed packaging.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement available for damaged or defective within 72 hours.

products.name: Organic Besan Flour
products.description: Certified organic gram flour for healthy cooking, free from chemicals and pesticides.

more_details.Key Features: Organic certification, high quality, fresh and pure besan flour.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in airtight container under cool conditions.
more_details.Return Policy: Return or replacement allowed for damages within 72 hours.

products.name: Roasted Sooji (Semolina)
products.description: Fine roasted sooji, ready to cook and ideal for quick dishes and desserts.

more_details.Key Features: Roasted for enhanced flavor, retains freshness and quality.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in airtight container to preserve taste.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement available for damaged items within 72 hours.
